data.title: Budapest, Hungary From $486 Round Trip (September-March)
data.message_headline: Book a trip to Budapest with these low fares!
data.headline:
1. Search using the Google Flights sample search below.
2. If you don't see your desired departure city but it is included in the list above, swap out the airport for the one you prefer.
3. Click on the calendar view to see the cheapest prices usually in green.
4. Book using the links Google Flights gives you.

* Prices might drop when you click through the lowest listed fares. If you book with a 3rd party site, be sure it’s one you trust.
data.message_body:
These flights are all with American Airlines and their alliance airline partners. There are a variety of itineraries available so you can search for one that works for you!

Some departure cities only have availability during the winter months, but there are lots of fun things to do in Hungary during that time of year! You can ice skate at Europe's largest outdoor ice rink, visit the Christmas markets, and take a horse-drawn sleigh ride through the forests! Then warm up by soaking in Budapest's famous thermal baths and eating hearty dishes like goulash and stew!

data.title: Hawai'i $200s-$400s Round Trip (May & Aug-Nov)
data.message_headline: Check out these low fares to multiple islands in Hawai'i!
data.headline:
1. Search using the Google Flights sample search below.


2. If you don't see your desired departure city but they are included in the list above, swap out the airport for the one you prefer.


3. Click on the calendar view to see the cheapest prices usually in green.

data.message_body:
All departure cities have 1 stop or nonstop options! Travel is with a variety of airlines depending on your departure city.

Travel Pono - At Pomelo Travel, we support responsible travel

Pono in Hawaiian means “to do what is right.” Whether you book this deal or not, it's important that when you travel to Hawaii you respect the local culture and people. We can all work together to maintain Hawaii's pristine natural beauty and protect our way of life. Check out this resourcefor tips on how to travel responsibly.

I love hearing from you, let me know if you book this deal!

- Shelbi
Pomelo Flight Expert

data.title: St. John's, Nova Scotia From $328 Round Trip (June-October)
data.message_body:
We haven't seen a deal to St. John's in a long time!! The summer and fall months are the best times to visit! Some cities have limited dates!

This 500 year-old city is one of the oldest cities in North America. It's full of vibrant and colorful architecture! Wake up early and head to Cape Spear, the eastern most point of North America to view the sunrise before anyone else on the continent!

I love hearing from you, let me know if you book this deal!

- Shelbi
Pomelo Flight Expert

data.title: Nairobi, Kenya $700s-$800s Round Trip (Sept-Nov & Jan-Feb)
data.message_body:

The Maasai Mara National Reserve is an incredible place to see zebra, gazelle, and wildebeest migrate! It's also the ideal place for predator sighting! You can see cheetahs, lions, leopards, and more. 🐆🦁

I love hearing from you, let me know if you book this deal!

- Shelbi
